sentences.sContent: The one thing that never crosses the minds of our elite is to utilise local talent, local enterprise, local money to build Pakistan.
sentences.sContent_eng: The one thing that never crosses the minds of our elite is to utilise local talent, local enterprise, local money to build Pakistan.
sentences.sCn: 有一件事从来没有穿过我们精英的头脑，那就是利用本地人才，本地企业，本地资金来建设巴基斯坦。

sentences.sContent: Another benefit is that learning software can utilise all three learning techniques of hearing, seeing and doing which greatly reinforces acquisition.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another benefit is that learning software can utilise all three learning techniques of hearing, seeing and doing which greatly reinforces acquisition.
sentences.sCn: 另一个好处是，学习软件可以利用看、听、做三种学习方式，加强学生对知识的理解和掌握。
